Create 2D color dataframe for gene/ADT coexpression

Source: R/coexpression.R
get_color_matrix_df.Rd

Create 2D color dataframe for gene/ADT coexpression

get_color_matrix_df(ngrid = 16)

Arguments

ngrid

integer setting the resolution (dimensions) of color grid (e.g., ngrid = 16 sets a 16x16 color grid). Default is ngrid=16.

Value

dataframe for use in coexpression legend

Examples

get_color_matrix_df(10)
#>     x_value y_value      R      G      B hex_color_mix
